dashboard.title: ONE DASHBOARD TO

features.workout: WORKOUT BUILDER, SEAMLESSLY POWERED BY AI
features.nutrition: CUSTOM MEALS OR OUR LIBRARY OF TASTY RECIPES
features.team: TEAM & BRANCH MANAGEMENT MULTIPLY YOUR IMPACT

dashboard.bottomDescription: Effortlessly manage your online training business, personalize client experiences, and drive results with the all-in-one solution for fitness professionals.

featureDescriptions.manage: Effortlessly manage your online training business, personalize client experiences, and drive results with the all-in-one solution for fitness professionals.
featureDescriptions.workout: Create killer workouts in seconds—use your own videos or tap into our massive library of exercises for home or gym.
featureDescriptions.nutrition: Custom meals or our library of tasty recipes—SuperCoach dishes out the perfect plan so your clients never get bored.
featureDescriptions.feedback: Empower your clients to respond to tasks by uploading key data like INBody readings, progress PHOTOS, lab reports, measurements, AND EXERCISE FORM CHECK—giving you real-time insights to fine-tune their programs.
featureDescriptions.team: Manage coaches, delegate tasks, and expand to new branches—without losing control or consistency.
